name: YSD
description: Yeung's Design Interactive Limited is a Hong Kong based advertising company, which is known as YSD. We have been established since Feb. 2000. As of today, we have grown substantially to serve companies around the world. At the beginning, we started with only professional websites and corporate image design services. Despite the fact that our market keeps changing for the best and in order for YSD to keep up with it, we moved into the core business of advertisement planning.

locations.address: 2902, King Palace Plaza, 52A Sha Tsui Road
